base_text_titles.en: Mishneh Torah, Rest on the Tenth of Tishrei

title: Maggid Mishneh on Mishneh Torah, Rest on the Tenth of Tishrei
enDesc: Written by Vidal of Tolosa, Maggid Mishneh is a commentary on Rambam’s Mishneh Torah. Although Vidal of Tolosa’s original commentary covered the entire Mishneh Torah, only a portion is extant.
